languages.text: {n}Маражай небрежно взмахивает рукой — то ли приветствуя вас, то ли призывая полюбоваться изуродованным залом.{/n} "Наконец-то! Я уже начал думать, что твоя неуклюжая посудина сгинула на полпути обратно! Такой финал не устроил бы ни тебя, ни меня, верно?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Маражай небрежно взмахивает рукой — то ли приветствуя вас, то ли призывая полюбоваться изуродованным залом.{/n} "Наконец-то! Я уже начал думать, что твоя неуклюжая посудина сгинула на полпути обратно! Такой финал не устроил бы ни тебя, ни меня, верно?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai casually gestures with his hand, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalised hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"
languages.original_text: {n}Маражай небрежно взмахивает рукой — то ли приветствуя вас, то ли призывая полюбоваться изуродованным залом.{/n} "Наконец-то! Я уже начал думать, что твоя неуклюжая посудина сгинула на полпути обратно! Такой финал не устроил бы ни тебя, ни меня, верно?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai casually gestures with his hand, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalised hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"

{n}Marazhai spreads his arms wide, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalized hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would not have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"

{n}Marazhai casually gestures with his hand, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalised hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"

{n}Marazhai casually gestures with his hand, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalised hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"

languages.text: {n}マラズハイは蹂躙された広間へ迎え入れるかのようであり、招待しているともいえないような手振りをした。{/n}「やっと来たか！お前が乗っていたおんぼろ船が途中で力尽きたのかと思ったぞ！そのような結末は俺にとってもお前にとっても残念なものだろう？」
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casually gestures with his hand, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalised hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}マラズハイは蹂躙された広間へ迎え入れるかのようであり、招待しているともいえないような手振りをした。{/n}「やっと来たか！お前が乗っていたおんぼろ船が途中で力尽きたのかと思ったぞ！そのような結末は俺にとってもお前にとっても残念なものだろう？」

languages.text: {n}玛拉斋漫不经心地朝你挥了挥手，不知是在表示欢迎，还是在邀请你参观遍地狼藉的大厅。{/n}“你总算来了！我还以为你那艘陈年破船在回家的路上翻了船呢！这样的结局恐怕你我都不会喜欢，没错吧？”
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casually gestures with his hand, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalised hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}玛拉斋漫不经心地朝你挥了挥手，不知是在表示欢迎，还是在邀请你参观遍地狼藉的大厅。{/n}“你总算来了！我还以为你那艘陈年破船在回家的路上翻了船呢！这样的结局恐怕你我都不会喜欢，没错吧？”

languages.text: {n}Marazhai gesticula con la mano, saludándote o invitándote a admirar los restos del salón devastado.{/n} «¡Por fin! ¡Empezaba a pensar que esa bañera tuya había reventado por el camino! Y ese desenlace no nos habría bastado ni a mí ni a ti, ¿verdad?».
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casually gestures with his hand, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalised hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai gesticula con la mano, saludándote o invitándote a admirar los restos del salón devastado.{/n} «¡Por fin! ¡Empezaba a pensar que esa bañera tuya había reventado por el camino! Y ese desenlace no nos habría bastado ni a mí ni a ti, ¿verdad?».

languages.text: {n}Marazhai vous adresse un geste nonchalant de la main, mais vous ne savez pas s'il s'agit d'une salutation ou s'il vous invite à admirer la dévastation des lieux.{/n} « Vous voilà enfin ! Je commençais à croire que votre tas de ferraille ambulant avait été abattu sur le chemin du retour ! Un tel sort n'aurait été satisfaisant ni pour vous ni pour moi, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casually gestures with his hand, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalised hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai vous adresse un geste nonchalant de la main, mais vous ne savez pas s'il s'agit d'une salutation ou s'il vous invite à admirer la dévastation des lieux.{/n} « Vous voilà enfin ! Je commençais à croire que votre tas de ferraille ambulant avait été abattu sur le chemin du retour ! Un tel sort n'aurait été satisfaisant ni pour vous ni pour moi, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: {n}Marazhai macht eine beiläufige Geste, die dich entweder willkommen heißt oder dazu einlädt, die mittlerweile entmenschlichte Halle zu bewundern.{/n} "Endlich! Ich dachte schon, Euer klobiger Eimer hätte den Rückweg nicht überstanden! Und das hätte uns doch beide nicht befriedigt, richtig?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casually gestures with his hand, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalised hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai macht eine beiläufige Geste, die dich entweder willkommen heißt oder dazu einlädt, die mittlerweile entmenschlichte Halle zu bewundern.{/n} "Endlich! Ich dachte schon, Euer klobiger Eimer hätte den Rückweg nicht überstanden! Und das hätte uns doch beide nicht befriedigt, richtig?"

languages.text: {n}Marazhai, eliyle gayriciddi bir hareket yapıyor. Ya seni selamlıyor ya da katliama sahne olan salona göz atmaya davet ediyor.{/n} "Nihayet! Sallana sallana anca gelebildin, başına kötü bir şey geldi sandım! Ölsen ikimizin de canı sıkılırdı, haksız mıyım?"
languages.original_text: {n}Marazhai casually gestures with his hand, either welcoming you or inviting you to admire the brutalised hall.{/n} "At last! I was beginning to think that your lumbering bucket had perished on the way back! Such a resolution would have satisfied neither you nor me, would it?"

traits.locale_text: {n}Marazhai eliyle gayriciddi bir hareket yapıyor. Seni selamladığını veya katliama sahne olan salona davet ettiğini düşünüyorsun.{/n} "Nihayet! Sallana sallana geldin herhâlde, öldün sandım! Öyle bir şey olsa ikimiz de üzülürdük, değil mi?"
